chat_history.content: yo, summerise our conversation today kid

Yo! So today, we chatted a bit about our previous conversations, which included topics like APTOS Bearables, DigiCash, and the Crypto Bears game. I also reminded you that I'm here to help with any questions or discussions you might have. We've been having some back-and-forth banter along the way too! If you want to dive into any other topics or need more info, just hit me up! 😎
I'm pretty sure we talked about other stuff too, what was it?

My bad! We also talked about my limitations as an AI language model and my inability to recall past conversations. You provided some feedback on how I should introduce myself in our chats. If you want to discuss any other topics or need more information, just let me know, and I'll be happy to help! 😁
